description: Ark: Survival Evolved is an epic open-world game that transports players to a mysterious island alive with danger and opportunity. Developed by Studio Wildcard, Ark tasks survivors with exploring its diverse primal landscapes teeming with dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures. Alone or in tribes, players must hunt, harvest resources, craft tools, tame and ride beasts, and build shelters to endure the elements. An ever-present threat of hunger, weather, and hostile creatures makes survival challenging. Players level up and use increasingly advanced blueprints to craft everything from stone hatchets to motorboats and tek structures. PvE and PvP multiplayer modes are immersed in an ecosystem simulation where players tightly must interact for long-term continuity on official servers. Since launching in 2017 via Steam Early Access, Ark has attracted millions of fans with its one-of-a-kind dino-filled survival experience.
name: Ark: Survival Evolved
